user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (sarah@quantuminnovations.com) with his input on the “Quantum Cohesion 2023” retreat, and remind him to check his Gmail and Notion for the relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Input Needed for “Quantum Cohesion 2023” Retreat

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please share your thoughts and suggestions for the upcoming “Quantum Cohesion 2023” retreat? Kindly send your reply to me at sarah@quantuminnovations.com.

For reference, all related materials are available in your Gmail and the team’s Notion workspace.

Thank you in advance for your input!

Best regards,  
Sarah

final_output:
